Peter's Quest

Leading off from just after the events of the first game, Pico and his pals are thrust into the heart of the realm Peter and his underlings reside in. As they journey further and further into his domain, his hold over them tightens. Play as Pico on his Quest to slay every last ant in existence to save all of mankind.

PLAY THE ORIGINAL (by @plufmot) TO GET UP TO SPEED https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/792123

Originally created for Peter the Ant Day 2021, but ran into some issues with the deadline and so figured I'd spend some more time polishing the game and would release it for Pixel Day 2022. It's the first game I've released in a while, hopefully you enjoy! :)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

﻿Controls:

Most of the game is controlled with the mouse.

Left Click: Select / Use

Right Click: Deselect

A/D: Move Left/Right

W/S: Move Up/Down

R - Restart game
